Hardware Accelerated Service Mesh Overview - Ismo Puustinen, Intel

This talk is about hardware enablement to Envoy. What are the challenges there and how they could be solved? CryptoMb, QAT and DLB contrib extensions are used as examples.kubecon.io​.
